sections.heading: 01|Regional councils of government
sections.text: Effective:November 17, 1967Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 266 - 107th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFThat governing bodies of any two or more counties, municipal corporations, townships, special districts, school districts, or other political subdivi

sections.heading: issued under section167.101of the  Revised Code are special obligation securities and are not general  obligations of the state, the issuing qualifying council, the  members of the issuing qualifying council, or any political  subdivision of the state
sections.text: Such securities shall not constitute debt for
